import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get user options/preferences"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/{UserId}/options"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the user's personal options and preferences, including notification settings, UI preferences, and feature flags.

**Prerequisites**
1. **UserId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) to locate the user and extract `Items[].UserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find the user: [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) -&gt; capture UserId.
2. Call [GET /api/v1.0/users/\{UserId\}/options](/docs/api/users/get-user-options) to retrieve current settings.
3. Update settings (if needed) via [POST /api/v1.0/users/\{UserId\}/options](/docs/api/users/set-user-options).

**Minimal Required Fields**: UserId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"UserId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"User identifier.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"51c89694-ae9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

</RequestSchema>
